column84:
25/Mar/25 12:22 PM;557058:5d279c32-8b06-4d12-a396-a9e2aba109aa;Starting integration today

product/page=1&limit=10 : to load all product in page 1 with limit 10

column26:
the emp/app user will login using pin(6digit), pre-generated by backend admin.

Q. How to proceed with this approach? [~accountid:5b4351534649a35be6ef91a6]

A. Admin will register the user in backend.

*Store id* - can be used as register with store , provide this store id at the time of first installation. Create a splash popup initially before login screen in flutter app.

*Device id -* Unique to the device

*ARN id -* generated after registration or first login

*PIN -* login pin

 

in Response:

Session Id

Access Token, Refresh token



refer to [https://pinakapos.atlassian.net/browse/SCRUM-68|https://pinakapos.atlassian.net/browse/SCRUM-68|smart-link]

# Pass store token to the authorise request

# If store id is not valid with device id, send and error
# send subscription end date in response
# Do we need role for the current user as response based on [https://pinakapos.atlassian.net/browse/SCRUM-84|https://pinakapos.atlassian.net/browse/SCRUM-84|smart-link]

Need to work on these task in new sprint 5 [~accountid:5b4351534649a35be6ef91a6]

List for

Insert for

# fast key tab 
Update for fast key tab details like image and title|
